name: Web Research
summary: OpenCode tool that runs Codex web search requests and returns structured summaries with sources.
why: Collect authoritative sources quickly without leaving the coding flow.
Standardize research output so decisions are traceable and reviewable.
Control depth with preset quality levels for faster or deeper dives.
what: An OpenCode custom tool that invokes the codex CLI with web_search_request enabled.
Returns a concise summary, key findings, and full source URLs.
useCases: Validate API behavior or library changes before implementation.
Gather competitive or product research for planning docs.
Verify compliance or licensing details with cited sources.
